Texto: 
no focal findings
surgical resection
• ct: hyperdense mass middle cranial fossa.
• mri: enhancing mass with surrounding intraaxial vasogenic edema, in the left middle cranial fossa
meningioma
• metastatic lesion
• hematoma
• aneurysm
• meningioma
46 year old woman who is evaluated for the shakes
and headaches for 3 weeks.
no brain invasion by pathology or at surgery despite the large amount of intraaxial vasogenic edema.
this lesion was so large it was difficult to determine its extra-axial location with imaging alone.
